question: William receives 95 emails a day. 20% of those emails don't require any response. He responds to the rest of them. How many emails does William respond to in a 4 day work week?
answer:
William receives 95*20/100=<<95*20/100=19>>19 emails that don't require a response
So he responds to 95-19=<<95-19=76>>76 emails per day
In a 4 day work week, William responds to 76*4=<<76*4=304>> 304 emails
#### 304
